mainText:
Hello,
 
As an Apple user, developer and long time enthusiast. All I can say, is
that we've all lost a genius and role model.
 
For many of us, looking to what Steve could see as a vision of future
computing has become a habit. 
 
I for one wish you all well at Apple. We the user base share your pain
and loss, but trust that what he started will be still the guiding light
for you all as you develop further.
author: John
